meaning: apply, answer, yes, OK, reply, accept

onyomiExamples.meaning: agreement, affirmative, aye, yes, OK, okay, yeah, all right
aid, assistance, help, support, reinforcement, cheering, rooting (for), support
hailing each other, acting in concert, responding (to), sympathizing (with), agreement, concord

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to respond, to answer, to meet (e.g. demands, expectations), to affect, to take a toll, to strike home, to have an effect on, to be hard on someone (e.g. heat, cold, work, illness, etc.), to be a strain
